divs: sighting detailsphotos were taken apri1 1, 2009 but not downloaded into my computer and viewed until sept 28, 2009. two photos were taken within seconds of each other. in one, three objects appear that are gone in the next picture. each object is comprised of three seperate white lights in a triangular formation. zooming is required to see the third light in each of the formations near the moon on the left side of the pictures. the attachments show a date of 4\2\09, but the computer file details show the date and time of the 'event' as stated above (4\1). i have attached the original photo of the object and an edited photo in which i circled the objects. the arrows point to a blue "star" that seems to be on the move and a star formation on the right to be used as a point of reference (for viewing the photo in which the objects gone).
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around April 1st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: While testing digital camera, three identical objects are photographed.
